column4: Is normal that apt-get update failed to fetch all Translations-en_US package? I have 9.04beta but ht ebehaviour is for 8.10 too.
I wrote is a 8.10 behaviour too
the porblem may be with your connection
do you have any third party repositories?
damn... is it possibile beacuse I'm italian using en_US?
is that possible I cannot choose the language I want? LOL
are you talking with me? paste the error? again? (i've never done)
this is from the output of apt-get update: "Ign http://archive.canonical.com jaunty/partner Translation-en_US"
is that space between .com and jaunty supposed to be there?
Ign http://archive.canonical.com jaunty/partner Translation-en_US | Ign http://ubuntu.mirror.garr.it jaunty/main Translation-en_US
are you using a desktop or laptop?
if a laptop try doing it from another connection, if desktop try a proxy server
you think can be my ip?
run sudo apt-get update again to be sure
I'm convinced the problem is network related
now I'll give a try to proxy way
